unnormalised: The buzz around the new startup, "Desi Tech Solutions," is real, bhai! They've just opened their main office at a prime location. Word on the street is it’s right next to that famous chai stall on Linking Road, you know, the one near Bandra station. The address is something like Office No. 7, 2nd Floor, above "Sharma Sweets," Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050.
normalised: The buzz around the new startup, "Desi Tech Solutions," is real, brother! They've just opened their main office at a prime location. Word on the street is it’s right next to that famous chai stall on Linking Road, you know, the one near Bandra station. The address is something like Office Number seven, second Floor, above "Sharma Sweets," Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty.

unnormalised: Heard from a friend who went for an interview that the office space is pretty swanky. Apparently, it's a huge upgrade from their old co-working space in Andheri. Imagine trying to get work done crammed into that small office at 12A, Shah Industrial Estate, Veera Desai Road, Andheri West, Mumbai 400053! No thanks!

unnormalised: Their new branch office is supposedly opening in Bangalore soon. Apparently, it will be located at Innov8 Coworking, 4th Floor, Vaishnavi Sapphire Centre, Tumkur Road, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore, 560022. Fingers crossed it's as strategically located as the Mumbai one.
normalised: Their new branch office is supposedly opening in Bangalore soon. Apparently, it will be located at Innovate Coworking, fourth Floor, Vaishnavi Sapphire Centre, Tumkur Road, Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and twenty two. Fingers crossed it's as strategically located as the Mumbai one.

unnormalised: Good luck finding parking on Linking Road though! Maybe Desi Tech Solutions should invest in some parking permits or a driver service. Just a thought from someone who spent 30 mins trying to find a spot near Shop No. 23, Galaxy Apartments, Carter Road, Bandra West, Mumbai 400052 last week.
